snippet: The company is recalling the whistle after reports that two children coughed out pieces of the toy that they had sucked into their mouths.
abstract: McDonald's is recalling Hello Kitty-themed whistle given to children in Happy meals after reports that two children coughed out pieces of the toy that they had sucked into their mouths.
lead_paragraph: The company is recalling the whistle after reports that two children coughed out pieces of the toy that they had sucked into their mouths.

headline.main: McDonald’s Issues Recall for Hello Kitty Whistles
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Issues Recall for Hello Kitty Whistles
